about_the_game: Plow through endless, fog-infested rooms as an interstellar custodian known as a Grasher in this twin-stick roguelike. With the help of a half-vacuum, half-cannon known as HADOS, inhale every last speck of junk, blast bizarre creatures known as foglins, and fling stuff in a randomly generated galaxy of endless possibilities. Beneath the fog lies the story of a universe where humans are scarce, foglins have run rampant, and the planet Earth appears to have gone missing.
